reviewText: My 5th graders were really excited watching this. It sparked a lot of good conversations. They were really sad to see things get caught, but this DVD shows it tactfully.
Good footage but not all that lengthy.

For 36 years, my daughter has always been curious and fascinated with animals and survival techniques. We have collected books & animal cards for several years, and the more we learned about animals, the more interested we became. This Edition is filled with information on what certain animals do to survive, as we learn about Predators, and Prey. The showing grabs your attention and keeps it until the end. The film is fascinating, colorful, interesting, and educational for both nature lovers and the classroom setting. This one is my daughter's favorite, and one that we watched a few times. Enjoyable, educational, and entertaining. Highly recommended!
Super interesting and fun to watch

this 25 minute feture tells you a little bit about predators and prey. it teachs young kids about the food chain in the animal kingdoom and how animals rely on each other to survive. i found this video interresting and i think it's good to show kids in schools. if you have not seen this movie then i recommend you do
